name: saft/saft-skeleton
description: This collection of classes helps you to accelerate while developing Semantic Web applications using the Saft framework.

suggest.ext-apc: Enables usage of APC cache (until PHP 5.5).
suggest.ext-apcu: Enables usage of APCu cache (since PHP 5.5).
suggest.ext-memcached: Enables usage of MemcacheD as cache backend.
suggest.ext-mongodb: Enables usage of MongoDB as cache backend.
suggest.ext-redis: Enables usage of Redis as cache backend.
